name: drakelikehate
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool memeados.
Tool description: Generate custom image, gif and video memes.
API description: Generate a "Drake Likes and Hates" meme by sending specified texts to the Memeados RapidAPI and receiving the generated meme data.

text2.description: The text to be displayed in the "hate" section of the meme.

text1.description: The text to be displayed in the "like" section of the meme.
